alert.note: Alert for Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 2:11PM MST until December 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch this afternoon. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 22 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Tripp County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Blizzard Warning, from noon Monday to midnight CST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible Christmas Day afternoon through Tuesday. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
